tutorProfilesSection.title: Meet Our 9 Expert Tutors
tutorProfilesSection.subtitle: World-Class Educators, Royal Clientele Endorsed
tutorProfilesSection.description: Our handpicked team of 8 tutors are selected by Elizabeth for their exceptional education pedigree, personalised approach and proven track record. The team includes Oxbridge alumni, Heads of Departments at top 10 UK schools, official examiners for GCSEs, A Levels and IB exams, and specialists across all academic subjects.

profiles.name: Rachel
profiles.title: Deputy Headteacher and Entrance Exam Specialist

experience.description: 27 years experience in independent and state systems as professionally qualified teacher and Deputy Headteacher

achievements.title: Entrance Exam Excellence
achievements.description: One tutee scored 93% in 11+ exam

achievements.title: Deputy Headteacher
achievements.description: Leadership role in both independent and state school systems

achievements.title: 11+ Specialist
achievements.description: Specialist in 7+ and 11+ entrance exam preparation

image.alt: Rachel - Deputy Headteacher and Entrance Exam Specialist

profiles.bio: Rachel is a professionally qualified teacher and Deputy Headteacher with 27 years of experience in both independent and state school systems. As an Entrance Exam Specialist focusing on 7+ and 11+ preparation, one of her tutees recently scored 93% in the 11+ exam.

teachingStyle.approach: Structured and supportive, building confidence through achievement

profiles.name: Derek
profiles.title: Maths, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

experience.description: 38 years experience as qualified Maths teacher and Head of Maths at leading independent London day school

achievements.title: Head of Mathematics
achievements.description: Head of Maths at leading independent London day school

achievements.title: Former Examiner
achievements.description: Former examiner for EdExcel and AQA examination boards

achievements.title: IB Coordinator
achievements.description: Qualified IB coordinator with international programme experience

achievements.title: Royal Family Tutor
achievements.description: Private tutor to Saudi Arabian royal family

image.alt: Derek - Maths, Biology, Chemistry and Physics Expert

profiles.bio: Derek is a qualified Maths teacher with 38 years of experience and Head of Maths at a leading independent London day school. He is a former examiner for EdExcel and AQA, a qualified IB coordinator, and has served as private tutor to the Saudi Arabian royal family.

teachingStyle.approach: Systematic and thorough, building mathematical confidence through understanding

profiles.name: Jay
profiles.title: Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Maths

experience.description: 30 years international teaching experience as qualified teacher and Deputy Head of multiple schools

achievements.title: School Leadership
achievements.description: Deputy Head of multiple schools with National Professional Qualification for Headteachers

achievements.title: Head of Science
achievements.description: Head of Science at leading boys' school

achievements.title: TPR Training
achievements.description: Trained in Total Physical Response (TPR) teaching methodology

image.alt: Jay - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Maths Expert

profiles.bio: Jay is a qualified teacher with 30 years of international experience and Deputy Head of multiple schools. He holds the National Professional Qualification for Headteachers, served as Head of Science at a leading boys' school, and is trained in Total Physical Response (TPR) methodology.

credentials.title: NPQH - National Professional Qualification for Headteachers

teachingStyle.approach: International perspective with innovative teaching methods including TPR

profiles.name: Emilia
profiles.title: Entrance Exams, History and University/Oxbridge Applications

experience.description: Entrance exam specialist with success placing students at Eton, Harrow, Highgate, Merchant Taylor, St Paul's, and Latymer

achievements.title: Elite School Placements
achievements.description: Helped secure places at Eton, Harrow, Highgate, Merchant Taylor, St Paul's, Latymer

achievements.title: Head of History
achievements.description: Head of History and official A Level examiner

achievements.title: Oxbridge Education
achievements.description: PGCE from Oxford and Masters in History from Cambridge

image.alt: Emilia - Entrance Exams, History and University Applications Expert

profiles.bio: Emilia holds a PGCE from Oxford and Masters in History from Cambridge. As an entrance exam specialist for 11+ and 13+, she has helped secure places at Eton, Harrow, Highgate, Merchant Taylor, St Paul's, and Latymer. She is Head of History and an official A Level examiner.

teachingStyle.approach: Rigorous academic preparation combined with strategic exam technique

profiles.name: Annette
profiles.title: English and History

experience.description: 37 years experience as qualified English and History teacher with extensive SEN experience

achievements.title: GCSE Examiner
achievements.description: GCSE examiner for Pearson/Edexcel, CIE and OCR for 25 years

achievements.title: National Tutoring Programme
achievements.description: National Tutoring Programme practitioner

achievements.title: SEN Specialist
achievements.description: Extensive experience with Special Educational Needs students

image.alt: Annette - English and History Expert with SEN Experience

profiles.bio: Annette is a qualified English and History teacher with 37 years of experience. She has been a GCSE examiner for Pearson/Edexcel, CIE and OCR for 25 years, is a National Tutoring Programme practitioner, and has extensive experience with Special Educational Needs students.

teachingStyle.approach: Inclusive and supportive, adapting to individual learning needs

profiles.name: Elle
profiles.title: Primary Specialist, Entrance Exams and Maths

experience.description: Top Entrance Exam Specialist with success at St Paul's, City of London, Dulwich College, Perse School

achievements.title: Elite School Success
achievements.description: Secured offers from St Paul's, City of London, Dulwich College, Perse School

achievements.title: Cambridge Mentor
achievements.description: Selected to mentor PGCE placement students from Cambridge University

achievements.title: Top Entrance Specialist
achievements.description: Recognised as top Entrance Exam Specialist for 7+ and 11+

image.alt: Elle - Primary Specialist, Entrance Exams and Maths Expert

profiles.bio: Elle is a qualified teacher specialising in Primary education and Entrance Exams for 7+ and 11+. She has secured offers from St Paul's, City of London, Dulwich College, and Perse School. She was selected to mentor PGCE placement students from Cambridge University and teaches Maths to A Level.

teachingStyle.approach: Child-centred and developmental, building strong foundations

profiles.name: Daniel
profiles.title: History, Politics, Economics and Sociology

education.degree: History, Politics, Economics and Sociology Specialist

experience.description: Providing 1-2-1 educational support since 2009 with examiner experience teaching from GCSE to University level

achievements.title: Examiner Experience
achievements.description: Official examiner with extensive marking and assessment experience

achievements.title: University Level Teaching
achievements.description: Teaches from GCSE to University level across multiple humanities subjects

achievements.title: Creative Teaching Approach
achievements.description: Uses variety of teaching styles with creative approach to learning

image.alt: Daniel - History, Politics, Economics and Sociology Expert

profiles.bio: Daniel has been providing 1-2-1 educational support since 2009 with examiner experience. He teaches History, Politics, Economics and Sociology from GCSE to University level, using a creative approach with a variety of teaching styles to engage students effectively.

teachingStyle.approach: Creative and varied, adapting teaching styles to individual student needs

profiles.name: David
profiles.title: Sciences, Maths and Oxbridge Entrance

education.degree: Master's in Natural Sciences with Biology and Chemistry

experience.description: 13 years international teaching experience including royalty, with laboratory science teaching fellowship

achievements.title: Cambridge Natural Sciences
achievements.description: Master's in Natural Sciences from Cambridge University with Biology and Chemistry focus

achievements.title: Teaching Fellowship
achievements.description: Laboratory science teaching fellow at St. John's Leatherhead

achievements.title: Royal Tutoring
achievements.description: 13 years international teaching experience including royalty

achievements.title: Research Experience
achievements.description: Parkinson's research specialisation during Master's degree

image.alt: David - Sciences, Maths and Oxbridge Entrance Expert

profiles.bio: David holds a Master's in Natural Sciences from Cambridge University with Biology and Chemistry specialisation, including Parkinson's research. He has 13 years of international teaching experience including royalty, and serves as a laboratory science teaching fellow at St. John's Leatherhead. He is fluent in French.

teachingStyle.approach: Research-informed with practical laboratory experience and international perspective
